languages.text: "Правда была сокрыта. Намеренно. Воспоминания твоих офицеров были украдены. Банки памяти всех когитаторов — очищены. Тебе пришлось кормить нас правдой по крупицам, чтобы мы смогли собрать ее — и понять".

"The truth was hidden. Deliberately. Your officers' memories were stolen. All the cogitators' memory banks were wiped. It took you feeding us the truth bit by bit for us to piece it together — and understand."
languages.original_text: "Правда была сокрыта. Намеренно. Воспоминания твоих офицеров были украдены. Банки памяти всех когитаторов — очищены. Тебе пришлось кормить нас правдой по крупицам, чтобы мы смогли собрать ее — и понять".

traits.locale_text: "The truth was hidden. Deliberately. Your officers' memories were stolen. All the cogitators' memory banks were wiped. It took you feeding us the truth bit by bit for us to piece it together — and understand."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.locale_text: "The truth was hidden. Deliberately. Your officers' memories were stolen. All the cogitators' memory banks were wiped. It took you feeding us the truth bit by bit for us to piece it together — and understand."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: «La verdad fue oculta. Intencionadamente. Los recuerdos de sus oficiales fueron robados. Los bancos de memoria de los cogitadores fueron borrados. Tuvo que darnos la verdad poco a poco para que pudiéramos descubrirla... y entender».
languages.original_text: "The truth was hidden. Deliberately. Your officers' memories were stolen. All the cogitators' memory banks were wiped. It took you feeding us the truth bit by bit for us to piece it together — and understand."

traits.locale_text: «La verdad fue oculta. Intencionadamente. Los recuerdos de sus oficiales fueron robados. Los bancos de memoria de los cogitadores fueron borrados. Tuvo que darnos la verdad poco a poco para que pudiéramos descubrirla... y entender».
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: 「真実は意図的に隠された。あなたの士官たちの記憶は盗まれたのだ。考算機の記憶バンクはすべて一掃された。あなたが我々に少しずつ真実を伝えたことで、我々はそれらを繋ぎ合わせて、理解することができた」
languages.original_text: "The truth was hidden. Deliberately. Your officers' memories were stolen. All the cogitators' memory banks were wiped. It took you feeding us the truth bit by bit for us to piece it together — and understand."

traits.locale_text: 「真実は意図的に隠された。あなたの士官たちの記憶は盗まれたのだ。考算機の記憶バンクはすべて一掃された。あなたが我々に少しずつ真実を伝えたことで、我々はそれらを繋ぎ合わせて、理解することができた」
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: “真相被隐藏了，刻意为之。你的军官们的记忆被盗走了，所有沉思者的记忆库都被清空了。你一点一点地告诉我们真相，我们才能把它拼凑起来，并加以理解。”
languages.original_text: "The truth was hidden. Deliberately. Your officers' memories were stolen. All the cogitators' memory banks were wiped. It took you feeding us the truth bit by bit for us to piece it together — and understand."

traits.locale_text: “真相被隐藏了，刻意为之。你的军官们的记忆被盗走了，所有思考器的记忆库都被清空了。你一点一点地告诉我们真相，我们才能把它拼凑起来，并加以理解。”
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: « La vérité a été cachée. Délibérément. Les souvenirs de vos officiers ont été volés. Toutes les banques mémorielles des cogitateurs ont été effacées. Il a fallu que vous nous nourrissiez petit à petit de la vérité pour que nous puissions la reconstituer... et la comprendre. »
languages.original_text: "The truth was hidden. Deliberately. Your officers' memories were stolen. All the cogitators' memory banks were wiped. It took you feeding us the truth bit by bit for us to piece it together — and understand."

traits.locale_text: « La vérité a été cachée. Délibérément. Les souvenirs de vos officiers ont été volés. Toutes les banques mémorielles des cogitateurs ont été effacées. Il a fallu que vous nous nourrissiez petit à petit de la vérité pour que nous puissions la reconstituer... et la comprendre. »
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Die Wahrheit wurde verborgen. Bewusst. Die Erinnerungen Eurer Offiziere wurden gestohlen. Die Gedächtnisbanken aller Cogitatoren wurden ausgelöscht. Ihr musstet uns die Wahrheit Stück für Stück füttern, damit wir sie zusammensetzen konnten — und verstehen."
languages.original_text: "The truth was hidden. Deliberately. Your officers' memories were stolen. All the cogitators' memory banks were wiped. It took you feeding us the truth bit by bit for us to piece it together — and understand."

traits.locale_text: "Die Wahrheit wurde verborgen. Bewusst. Die Erinnerungen Eurer Offiziere wurden gestohlen. Die Gedächtnisbanken aller Cogitatoren wurden ausgelöscht. Ihr musstet uns die Wahrheit Stück für Stück füttern, damit wir sie zusammensetzen konnten — und verstehen."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Gerçekler saklandı. Kasten. Subaylarınızın anılarını çaldılar. Tüm kavramsayarların hafızaları silindi. Bize gerçeği parça parça verdiniz, biz de bu parçaları bir araya getirip anladık."
languages.original_text: "The truth was hidden. Deliberately. Your officers' memories were stolen. All the cogitators' memory banks were wiped. It took you feeding us the truth bit by bit for us to piece it together — and understand."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçekler saklandı. Kasten. Subaylarınızın anılarını çaldılar. Tüm kavramsayarların hafızaları silindi. Bize gerçeği parça parça verdiniz, biz de bu parçaları bir araya getirip anladık."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos
